item.title: Industrial Noise Control
item.description: Noise control in industrial and occupational settings to reduce the noise exposure of employees or mitigate noise impacts on neighboring properties.

item.title: Environmental Acoustics
item.description: Measurement, modeling and analysis of noise in the outdoor environment. Development of mitigation to satisfy regulation and noise nuisance critera.

item.title: HUD Noise Studies
item.description: Environmental acoustics studies that conform to HUD’s requirements for multi-family housing development.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Joshua Leasure, P.E. Principal (970) 673-4383 joshua@coloradoanalytics.com We are located in Fort Collins, Colorado
